page.title: 16A DAY IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content:
Most people's day starts at 8.00am.Most children go to the primary school from 9 to 3.Older children go to the high schools in West Calder and Blackburn.This lasts from 8.50 till
3.40.Meanwhile those who are lucky enough to have a job got to work,although a number of women work twilight shifts every evening. We have a library van which comes every Monday and it is always busy.We have a community centre which starts at 7 and ends at half past 8.This is for primary age.then it's to bed to start another day.
